assessments.task_description:
In the individual research assignment, students are to research specific topic areas. Students will be rewarded for information gathered outside of the seminar content and developing arguments based on the evidence they have collected. Students will need to read academic papers as well as regulatory information to answer short answer, essay style and numerical questions. It will involve the use of Excel, and a bibliography will be required. 

Further details on the assignment will be provided on the Blackboard site. The assignment will have a maximum word count of 3,000 words (subject to change).
